org.usfirst.frc2084.vision

Class TargetTrackingExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • edu.wpi.first.smartdashboard.gui.DisplayElement
              • edu.wpi.first.smartdashboard.gui.StaticWidget
                • org.usfirst.frc2084.vision.TargetTrackingExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.smartdashboard.properties.PropertyHolder, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class TargetTrackingExtension
extends edu.wpi.first.smartdashboard.gui.StaticWidget
    Team 2084's custom vision processing SmartDashboard extension. It uses our algorithm to detect whether the target the camera is pointing at is hot and tells the robot about it. This extension requires the use of our patched SmartDashboard in order to load the native OpenCV libraries that it requires.
    Author:
    Ben Wolsieffer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static org.opencv.core.Size IMAGE_SIZE

        public void disconnect()
